item.title: "None Now Live Who Remember It:" Why Galadriel Appears To Lie In The Lord Of The Rings' Opening Monologue
item.description: Galadriel's sweeping statement in The Fellowship of the Ring's prologue is confusing, since it likely isn't technically true, given the book story.

item.title: Thunderbolts* Box Office Numbers: Total, Worldwide, Domestic, Opening & Records
item.description: Thunderbolts* has been given the coveted May release slot, and here's how the box office fared domestically and worldwide after its opening weekend.

item.title: "It's Exhausting": Alan Ritchson Shares BTS Look Of His Action Movie From Expendables 4 Director
item.description: Alan Ritchson is sharing some behind-the-scenes looks for his upcoming action thriller movie from The Expendables 4 director, Scott Waugh.
